query:
SELECT
                m.merchant_id,
                m.name,
                m.api_key,
                m.user_id,
                m.status,
                m.created_at,
                m.updated_at,
                m.deleted_at,
                COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_count
            FROM merchants m
            WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
              AND ($1::TEXT IS NULL OR 
                   m.name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%' OR 
                   m.api_key ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%' OR 
                   m.status ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%')
            ORDER BY m.merchant_id
            LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
